description:
In order to prevent Hiroki Moriyama from recapturing Ryuzu`s former lab, which is still being investigated by Ibuki and the others, Taiyou has a rematch with the insufferable Company agent. Through the fight, Taiyou closes in on the secret within Hiroki`s heart, the reason he obstinately clings to the self-styled title of "champion of justice."
Source: crunchyroll
